Awaken Faith in the Great Healer 

     The soothing power of pure truth seen, acted, and maintained in all its bearings is of a value no language can express to people 
                                                                           235
who are suffering with disease. Keep ever before the suffering sick the compassion and tenderness of Christ, and awaken their conscience to a belief in His power to relieve suffering, and lead them to faith and trust in Him, the Great Healer, and you have gained a soul and ofttimes a life.
